title: How to write a speech on the topic: we can overcome…? Any ideas - Quora

response.answer_text: It sounds like a writer’s block. Just start writing no matter how ridiculous the words are until you find you can write something that makes sense. The trick is to just write. I started one such journal with the words “I have nothing to write about.” I almost could not stop writing.

First, you must decide what it is you can overcome. Then, make a claim about how you can overcome it. Give examples of what must be overcome and reasons why you can overcome it even though it won’t be easy. State what is required of those who wish to overcome whatever it is. Call upon those who need to overcome whatever it is to step forward and do what is necessary.
